title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Title: [3-Pack] VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter, Type L — 3-Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4-in-1 USA to Italy/Uruguay/Chile

Short Description:
Travel-ready Type L plug adapters designed for Italy and select countries. Each compact adapter offers two American outlets plus dual USB (up to 2.4A total), supporting standard North American 2- or 3-prong plugs. Grounded for safety, CE/FCC certified, and perfect for charging phones, tablets, and power banks. Not a voltage converter; use with dual-voltage devices (100–250V).

Key Features:
- 4-in-1 Power: 2 American AC outlets + 2 USB ports (up to 2.4A shared) per adapter.
- Grounded Safety: Secure 3-prong Type L plug for stable, reliable connections.
- Broad Compatibility: Accepts North American 2- and 3-prong flat pin plugs.
- High Capacity: Up to 2500W (250V, 10A) for suitable dual-voltage appliances.
- Travel-Ready: Ultra light and compact; dimensions per unit: 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 in.
- Certified Quality: CE and FCC certified for safety and performance.
- Trusted Support: 12-month warranty and friendly customer service.

Where It Works:
- Type L countries: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, Vatican City.

Ideal For:
- Low to medium power electronics: cell phones, tablets, power banks, e-readers, cameras, and other dual-voltage devices.

Important Notes:
- Not a Converter: Does not convert voltage. Ensure your device supports 100–250V dual voltage before use.
- Power Guidelines: Suitable for devices within 2500W at 250V/10A. Check appliance labels for voltage and wattage.

What’s in the Box:
- 3 x VINTAR Type L Italy Travel Power Adapters (each with 2 AC outlets + 2 USB ports).
- User guide.

Specifications:
- Input: Accepts standard North American 2- or 3-prong flat pin plugs.
- Output: Type L plug (Italy and compatible regions).
- Electrical Rating: 2500W max, 250V max, 10A max.
- USB Output: Up to 2.4A total across two ports.
- Voltage Compatibility: 100–250V (for dual-voltage devices).
- Size (per adapter): 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 in.
- Certifications: CE, FCC.
- Warranty: 12 months.

Why Choose VINTAR:
Enjoy a compact, travel-friendly design with grounded safety, multiple charging options, and reliable certifications—tailored for seamless charging throughout Italy and other Type L destinations.
